other_tests.findings: Positive for SDHB and TP53 germline mutations.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
other_tests.findings: Progression of disease, with enlargement of the right adrenal mass and aortocaval lymph node conglomeration.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The right adrenal mass increased in size and now abutted the inferior vena cava.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
other_tests.findings: Extensive disease with increased plasma metanephrines levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant rise in plasma normetanephrines and metanephrines after initial diagnosis.

other_tests.date: Two months after the initial diagnosis
